perturbation.original_text: The Administrator shall pay for Fund shares by the scheduled close of federal funds transmissions on the same Business Day it places an order to purchase Fund shares in accordance with this section using the NSCC's Fund/SERV System. Payment shall be in federal funds transmitted by wire from the Fund's designated Settling Bank to the NSCC.
perturbation.changed_text: The Administrator shall pay for Fund shares within 3 Business Days from the date it places an order to purchase Fund shares in accordance with this section using the NSCC's Fund/SERV System. Payment shall be made via ACH transfer to the Fund's designated account.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding the payment deadline and method. The original text specifies payment on the same Business Day via wire transfer from the Fund's Settling Bank to the NSCC. The modified text allows for payment within 3 Business Days via ACH transfer to the Fund's account. This creates uncertainty about which payment terms apply.

perturbation.original_text: Payment for Fund shares redeemed shall be made in accordance with this section using the NSCC's Fund/SERV System. Payment shall be in federal funds transmitted by the NSCC to the Separate Account's Settling Bank as designated by the Administrator, on the same Business Day the Fund or the underwriter receives notice of the redemption order from the Administrator provided that the Fund or the underwriter receives notice by 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time on such Business Day.
perturbation.changed_text: Payment for Fund shares redeemed shall be made within 5 Business Days of the Fund or the underwriter receiving notice of the redemption order from the Administrator. Payment shall be made via check mailed to the Separate Account address as designated by the Administrator.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding the payment timeline and method for redemptions. The original text specifies same-day payment via federal funds transfer through the NSCC. The modified text allows for payment within 5 Business Days via mailed check. This contradiction creates ambiguity and potential disputes over the agreed-upon redemption process.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement shall terminate (a) at the option of any party, upon 90 days' advance written notice to the other parties hereto; or (b) in the event of a material breach that has not been cured within ten days following a written notice of breach to the breaching party.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement shall terminate (a) at the option of any party, upon 30 days' advance written notice to the other parties hereto; or (b) in the event of any breach, material or otherwise, that has not been cured within thirty days following a written notice of breach to the breaching party.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies a 90-day notice for termination at will and a 10-day cure period for material breaches. The modified text shortens the notice period to 30 days and extends the cure period to 30 days but includes ANY breach for termination. This creates conflicting terms regarding the termination process, leading to uncertainty and potential disputes.
